duties_responsibilities.duty: Read work orders, follow production drawings, and assemble components in specified relationship to each other.
Perform intermediate assembly tasks, such as potting, encapsulating, and stamping parts.
Perform online testing and inspection to ensure parts meet production specifications and standards.
Handle and install polarized/non-polarized components on designated locations on the product.
Complete touch-up, inspect own work, and report nonconforming defects.
Assist, instruct, and qualify new operators in assembly processes.
Assemble complex units for wiring, connecting sub-assemblies into large rack systems.

education_certification.credential: Completion of a high school degree or equivalent is preferred. Successful completion of company-provided training may be required.
